attributes.action: remove cash benefits, and introduce a coupon based system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We request that benefit payments be removed as a cash scheme, because this system is old, over subscribed and filled with major corruption.  The replacement scheme should include a booklet which contains stamps and coupons, which entitles the claimant to spend these at recommended outlets, up to the value on the coupon.
This new scheme would entitle the user to the same benefits, but under much more control.
This scheme would save millions of pounds and remove virtually all fraudulent activity within the benefit system.
